gunslinger.name: gunslinger
gunslinger.title: Gunslinger
gunslinger.story: A headhunter from the West seeks vengeance in these dangerous lands, for his family has been murdered in most groosome way in front of his eyes. The traces of the killer lead to a secluded area somewhere in the deep forests that embrace the Fading Sea.
gunslinger.description: Wielding a set of twin revolvers, his attacks are swift and with outermost precision.

automaton.name: automaton
automaton.title: Automaton
automaton.story: A marvel created by the finest engineers of this age, standing eight feet tall and having the strength to lift five grown men. Within his hardened carapace of steel and brass lies a furnace instead of a heart. For in his nature lies no evil, only a childlish wonder.
automaton.description: He is the most armored combatant, and is able to utilize powerful punches and flames.

musketeer.name: musketeer
musketeer.title: Musketeer
musketeer.story: A hardened individual baptised by the fires of the great Northern war, he seen it all. In the army, he was known as an agile sharpshooter, able to take out foes at great distance. Losing everything that he had, he seeks piece and life off shore.
musketeer.description: Having a keen eye, he is accurate marksman, encouraging comrades in battle.

alchemist.name: alchemist
alchemist.title: Alchemist
alchemist.story: In a world ruled by superstition and folklore, an alchemist is an important figure in the known world. With her intelligence and alchemy skills, she prepares various potions and devastating projectiles.
alchemist.description: Uses different missiles in her arsenal.

assasin.name: assasin
assasin.title: Assasin
assasin.story: Always lingering in the shadows, her cunning personality guarrantees her no friends, rather just enemies, which she gets rid off in silence. Nobody knows who she is, only that she is of oriental and mysterious origin.
assasin.description: Her stealthy abilities are lethal and her weapons unforgiving.

illusionist.name: illusionist
illusionist.title: Illusionist
illusionist.story: Comming from the noble background, she is an outcast of their family. Employed by the best performers of the streets, she outmached them all, then once again left to search her own destiny. Since her only desire is pure fun.
illusionist.description: Her cunning wits prove outstanding battle performance.
